description: Assesses persuasive writing for real-world audiences and purposes

levels.4: Writing is precisely tailored to the specific audience; anticipates their concerns and values
levels.3: Writing shows awareness of the target audience
levels.2: Some awareness of audience but not well-tailored

feedback_stems.strength: You clearly understood your audience, especially when you
feedback_stems.growth: Think deeply about your audience—what do they care about? What will convince them?

levels.4: Purpose is clear and the call to action is specific, achievable, and compelling
levels.3: Purpose is clear with an identifiable call to action
levels.2: Purpose is vague or call to action is unclear
levels.1: No clear purpose or call to action

feedback_stems.strength: Your purpose and call to action were clear and compelling
feedback_stems.growth: Be specific about what you want your audience to DO after reading

levels.4: Uses sophisticated persuasive strategies appropriate for the real-world context
levels.2: Uses basic persuasive strategies with limited effectiveness

feedback_stems.strength: Your persuasive strategies were well-chosen for this context
feedback_stems.growth: Choose strategies that fit your real-world context—what works for THIS audience?

levels.4: Format perfectly suits the real-world genre (editorial, proposal, speech, etc.)
levels.3: Format is appropriate for the chosen genre
levels.2: Format partially matches the genre conventions
levels.1: Format does not match the genre

feedback_stems.strength: Your format was perfect for this type of writing
feedback_stems.growth: Study examples of this genre—match the format and conventions your audience expects
